name: Sailing
description: Sailing is a token representation of the Sailing Company Shares. The Sailing Company is the company building the Sailing Protocol. The Sailing Protocol mounts the world economy on a new financial layer that is composable, drastically more accessible, faster, cheaper, and without down-time. At Sailing Protocol we believe that in the future most economic activity will be on-chain. In this future, we will need to digitalize the off-chain assets to be able to use them in transactions and across smart contracts. The Sailing Protocol is the engine powering the future cryptoeconomy.
